scripts.dev: npm run dev:setup && concurrently -n db,shared,backend,frontend -c blue,yellow,green,cyan "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:backend:wait" "npm run dev:frontend:wait"
scripts.dev:db:start: docker compose up -d postgres && npm run dev:db:wait
scripts.dev:backend:wait: node scripts/wait-for-db.js && npm run prisma:migrate -w @optiq/backend && npm run dev -w @optiq/backend
scripts.build: npm run build -w @optiq/shared && npm run prisma:generate -w @optiq/backend && npm run build -w @optiq/backend && npm run build -w @optiq/frontend
